text: Victor Quintana (born 17 April 1976 in Misiones, Paraguay) is a retired Paraguayan football player, who played as a defensive midfielder. Quintana started his career by playing for Club San Miguel de Misiones and then moved to Olimpia, where he won the 1998, 1999 and 2000 Paraguayan League. He then moved to FC Porto and returned on loan to Olimpia in 2002, year in which the club won the Copa Libertadores. The same year, he signed for Cruzeiro Esporte Clube and afterwards he played for a different number of clubs before retiring in 2008. title: Victor Quintana
